sub_title: Maker in-, and Designer of Education
summary:
I am doing research in the field of design and education. As design researcher and teacher I redesign my education on a daily basis. I am fascinated by learning and more specifically the role that the mistake plays in this process. You can find me in Stadslab Rotterdam, mostly on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays. 

Let's get in touch to talk about education, design and/or creative processes. 
I consider myself a creative catalyst, helping others (with enthusiasm and passion) to innovate education or other businesses.

treasury_media.title: Seven Years of Plenty? / Zeven jaar Rijkdom?
treasury_media.description: Book written with professor Peter Troxler on the past seven years (2012 - 2019) of Stadslab Rotterdam. It is available in two languages. DM me for details! I'd love to share these insights with others!

treasury_media.title: Book: Hey Teacher, Find Your Inner Designer
treasury_media.description: Our world has changed a great deal since we first (or last) designed education. The current educational setting – a bunch of students in a classroom, at a set time and place, with one teacher sharing their knowledge as an omniscient authority – is...

treasury_media.title: Hey teacher, find your inner designer (preview)
treasury_media.description: Presentation for teachers, researchers and professors at the Rotterdam University of applied sciences to tell about my work in the master design. Final publication is expected in the beginning of 2019. If you're interested in a version of this...

treasury_media.title: Smart Pop-Up Rotterdam (Minor+ Making for Professionals & Experience Design for the Internet of Things)
treasury_media.description:
This work of 'my' students in the Minor+ (honors education) Making for Professionals and the Minor+ Experience Design for the Internet of Things makes me proud. These students, from different educational backgrounds (even different organizations) developed a Smart Pop-Up store in Rotterdam. In this video (dutch), which we recorded with a smartphone, students explain what this mean and how they did it. 

For me this is a good example of new education, educated in an iterative way.
2014 - 2015

treasury_media.title: Talk 3D Printen (TED format)
treasury_media.description:
Wat kan de kinderopvang met 3D printen? De Lange Keizer in Delft vroeg het zich af en maakte ruimte voor een 3D talk over 3D printen op hun studiedag. In deze presentatie namen we de zaal mee in de wereld van 3D printen vandaag en in de toekomst. 

Deze presentatie is verzorgt in het Filmhuis Lumen in Delft. (formaat 16:10)

treasury_media.title: 3rd revolution happening in Rotterdam
treasury_media.description: Presentation for 4th year students Industrial Design at the University of Antwerpen.

projects.title: Stadslab Rotterdam
projects.description: Het Stadslab is een technische werkplaats van de Hogeschool Rotterdam in het centrum van Rotterdam. Experimenteren en open innovatie zijn hier de paradigma’s, in samenwerking met de Rotterdammers en de Rotterdamse bedrijven. In drie Labs worden met creatieve technieken, nieuwe technologie en open data gewerkt aan vraagstukken over en innovaties voor Rotterdam.

contributors.headline: Maker in-, and Designer of Education
Director at Participatory City Making lab

projects.title: Media Future Week
projects.description:
As described on the website; "Students, professors and lectors from various media programs will be taken on a rollercoaster ride of co-creation sessions, crossovers, lectures and inspiration sessions with leading speakers from the international media industry. Media Future Week’s purpose is to bring participants to the next level in their field and enforce the relationship between education and media industry.

Participants in the MFW are challenged to develop their own vision on the media future and their role as future media professional. They will work in mixed teams on a cross-media case from the industry. Media companies provide the MFW participants with a case or problem. During the week, the participants work on these cases and present a solution at the end of the week. Amongst others, there will be cases about multi screen applications and about smart societies." 

During this week I work as a facilitator of one of the project-teams. The MFW was held in 2011, 2012 and 2013.

projects.title: Teachers as designers - the value of the mistake (of teachers) for education
projects.description: I believe that if teachers act more like designers (instead of instructors or coaches only) education will become (more) future proof. I also believe that teachers already possess designer abilities.

profile_positions.title: Lecturer & Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Future leadership is all about creating and designing for the new world. This requires a new generation of entrepreneurs. With a mindset of 'getting there'. We can't change the world, but at least we will create a movement. Who am I? One of these new entrepreneurs in the field of social business and co-creation. I'd love to work in Fablabs and experiment in creative sessions. Get something going on!
Take a look at some recent projects at our Facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/StudiovanderSar 

And please, get in touch. I'd love to talk about my ambition to change the way we create, design, make and educate people to do so. If it helps we can make 3D printing the talking subject and I bring my 3D printers (and knowledge) to you!
profile_positions.title: Creative Catalyst

profile_positions.description: The National Youth Council wants to promote youth participation in any way that youngsters themselves consider as important. It is an organization for and by young people. One of their projects in wich I'm involved is organized in different Youth Detentions and / or closed institutions. In these detentions and institutes different debates are organized to allow these young people to speak and to participate in their own environment.
profile_positions.title: Trainer

profile_positions.description: What started as a creative mind in de editorial staff became the new designer in the team. It isn't easy to design and fill the magazine for the volleybal association Kratos'08 (near 400 members). A great oppertunity to try out new stuff, and practice all my learned things..
profile_positions.title: Editor

profile_positions.description: Since May 2008 vv Skania en vv Ariston have merged officially. Within the governing board I coordinate three commissions: The Internet site, the club booklet and the sponsor commission. Moreover I give interpretation to the PR of Kratos '08. The newest and biggest volleyballclub of Delft. For the new sport accomodation at Delft Zuid I've designed all the icons and banners. And I designed both the style of Kratos '08 and B&EST.
profile_positions.title: Director Communication & PR

profile_positions.description:
Zilver is a consultancy operating on the crossroads of branding, innovation and design. Zilver aligns branding, innovation and design within the organisation to deliver meaningful and authentic user experiences.

For this way of working with brands and innovation strategies I've developed a digital way to collect, share and react on the brand. This product will be developed for designers, engineers, developers and researchers who work with the brand. Partners in this development process are Zilver Brand Driven Innovation and the Rotterdam University of applied science.
profile_positions.title: Graduation Internship
President Student section Central Coadministration Council

profile_positions.description:
I work on several projects, as both a student and employee at the Hogeschool Rotterdam. I represented students in debates with board meetings and worked as peer coach in first year projects. Were I cloud inspirate and motivate other students to get them to their goal. 
For several years I represented students of the Hogeschool Rotterdam as chairmen. In this position I get to deal with negotiation and convincing other people to get to my (and other students) goal.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistent and Peer Coach

profile_positions.description: After founding the study association I received the honour to become the first President of the study association Triple Media. Activities, sponsors and our place at the Hogeschool Rotterdam must be discovered for the first time.
profile_positions.title: First chairman

profile_positions.description: The three media training of the Hogeschool Rotterdam knew up to 2007 no study association. The need from students to get to know each other and to meet businesses remained thereby unanswered. I feeled honoured to make that happen. And with the help of a lot of students, teachers and employees within some months a real study association has been set up. The notary on 9 April made it entirely complete. On the 10th of April we celebrated the official association.
profile_positions.title: Initiator

volunteer_experiences.description:
by Matthijs Huizing

"In March 2009 Manon and I went with a group for a field visit to Ghana and Benin. The purpose of this visit was to see the results of the work Right To Play does in the field and create awareness with the Dutch people. Manon was selected from a large group of applicants for this trip. Her job was to make a videofilm of the trip and after our return to The Netherlands give presentations to schools. During the trip I got the opportunity to get to know Manon better. She is a nice dedicated person with a good sense of humour. Manon is able to balance business and fun. The videofilm she made was great and of good quality. It will be used by us for presentations. I am glad that I have been able to work with her and am very happy that she signed up to become a volunteer for Right To Play."

May 22, 2009, Matthijs managed Manon indirectly as currect director at Right To Play

The National Youth Council wants to promote youth participation in any way that youngsters themselves consider as important. It is an organization for and by young people. One of their projects in which I'm involved is organized in different Youth Detentions and / or closed institutions. In these detentions and institutes different debates are organized to allow these young people to speak and to participate in their own environment.

What started as a creative mind in de editorial staff became the new designer in the team. It isn't easy to design and fill the magazine for the volleybal association Kratos'08 (near 400 members). A great opportunity to try out new stuff, and practice all my learned things. I also designed the logo of this Volleybal club and all the logo's used in their new sport accommodation. (2008, Delft)
For almost two years I participated in the board as director of communication.

In 2013 I participated in the organization of a volleybalcamp with Nevobo (Dutch volleybal association). Training several young talented players from 15 - 18 years old made me discover a new passion. My ambition for sport (as a semi-professional sportsplayer (national volleyball competition)) was combined with my expertise as a professional trainer. In the beginning of 2015 I graduated my training as VT3 trainer. This certificate makes it possible to independently train teams from youth to senior teams in the regional division (4th highest division in the Netherlands out of 10 divisions).

Since 2013 I patricipate each year in at least organising 1 volleybalcamp with Nevobo (Dutch volleybal association). Training several young talented players from 15 - 18 years old made me discover a new passion and develops me as a volleybaltrainer and organizer of events. (And yes, it's fun..!)

When moving to a new region (from Rotterdam to 's Hertogenbosch) I was looking for ways to connect with other enthousiasts on new technology. 3D printing is one of them. In 2011 I build my first 3D printer (Ultimaker 1) when founding Stadslab Rotterdam. In 2013 I bought my first own 3D printer, in 2014 I built my second personal printer (Prusa i3) and I'm enjoying these new possibilities. I try to help out other organisations with this technique and the changing ways to educate people. For 3D Hubs I organize several events in 's Hertogenbosch to set-up a local 3D community.
